mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community_post ( post_type, category, title, content, writer_id, writer_type, branch_id, views, is_visible, post_visible, sport_type, recruit_max, recruit_end_date, display_start, display_end, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{postType}, #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{writerType}, #{branchId}, 0, 1, 1, #{sportType}, #{recruitMax}, #{recruitEndDate}, #{displayStart}, #{displayEnd}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select:
SELECT cp.post_id AS postId, cp.post_type AS postType, cp.category, cp.title, cp.content, cp.writer_id AS writerId, cp.writer_type AS writerType, cp.branch_id AS branchId, cp.views, cp.is_visible AS isVisible, cp.post_visible AS postVisible, cp.sport_type AS sportType, cp.recruit_max AS recruitMax, cp.recruit_end_date AS recruitEndDate, cp.display_start AS displayStart, cp.display_end AS displayEnd, cp.created_at AS createdAt, cp.updated_at AS updatedAt,
COUNT(crj.join_id) AS recruitCount
FROM community_post cp LEFT JOIN community_recruit_join crj ON crj.post_id = cp.post_id
WHERE cp.post_type = 'COMMUNITY' AND cp.is_visible = 1 AND cp.post_visible = 1
GROUP BY cp.post_id ORDER BY cp.created_at DESC

COUNT(crj.join_id) AS recruitCount
FROM ( SELECT post_id FROM community_post WHERE post_type = 'COMMUNITY' AND is_visible = 1 AND post_visible = 1 ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset} ) ids JOIN community_post cp ON cp.post_id = ids.post_id LEFT JOIN community_recruit_join crj ON crj.post_id = cp.post_id
GROUP BY cp.post_id ORDER BY cp.created_at DESC
